text: Allenton may refer to: ==Places== *Allenton, Derbyshire, England *Allenton, New Zealand, a suburb in the town of Ashburton, New Zealand *Allenton, Northumberland, England is now called Alwinton *Allenton, Michigan, USA *Allenton, Wisconsin, USA ==See also== *Allanton (disambiguation) *Allentown (disambiguation)
title: Allenton
